item.title: Community Development: What we do
item.description: Community Development: What We Do The Community Development (ComDev) project provides a wide array of information, FAQs, and help to newcomers and existing committers, and maintains a number of helpful tools. Community Development: What We Do Mentoring for Individuals and Help Getting Around Mentoring for Projects Education + Outreach Diversity Conference Travel Assistance Tools and Code we Maintain Physical artifacts About This Website Mentoring for Individuals and Help Getting Around GSoC Contributors Guide Committers Guide Project Management Committees Mentoring for Projects Incubator Mentors - Many folks here are IPMC members or mentors, too Get community advice on dev@community Education + Outreach ApacheCon Partnered Industry Events (FOSDEM etc.
